LandingPage.disclaimer: By tapping to proceed, you agree to the

AuthenticationPage.text: MedFoyer uses your birthday to make sure nobody else checks in for you, please enter it below.

LocationPage.tooFar: You are too far away, please check in when you have arrived.

modal.title: We need your permission
modal.text: MedFoyer uses GPS to ensure you are at your doctor's office before checking in, when tapping okay, you will be prompted to give MedFoyer permission.
modal.instructions_1: You may need to provide your web browser with permission.
modal.instructions_2: To do so, open settings, and navigate to:
modal.instructions_3: Once there, select "While Using the App"
modal.openSettings: Tap here to open your phone settings
modal.notSupported: MedFoyer uses GPS to ensure you are at your destination before checking in, but it looks like your device does not currently support GPS.

waiting.text: We'll let you know you when your doctor is ready.
waiting.successText: Please wait in your car or your favorite nearby cafe.

WaitlistPage.telehealth: Your doctor is requesting a telehealth visit.
WaitlistPage.telehealth_nolink: Please contact your doctor for the link.
